doc.after: Transport in Liverpool is primarily centred on the city s road and rail networks both of which are extensive and provide links across the United Kingdom Liverpool has an extensive local public transport network which is managed by the Merseyside Passenger Transport Executive and includes buses trains and ferries Additionally the city also has an international airport and a major port both of which provides links to locations outside the country
